hurdle.rationale: Scale marketplace with positive cash generation merits 150 bps reduction from base 15% hurdle.

valuation.notes: Five-year FCF scenarios extend 2024 TTM owner-earnings with margin expansion pacing guidance and delivery mix improvements.

WACC-point.quote: Risk-free rate (UST10Y) 31-Dec-2024: 3.00%. Damodaran implied ERP Jan-2025: 4.00%. Levered beta (2Y weekly vs SPX): 0.90.

WACC-lower.quote: Risk-free rate (UST10Y) 31-Dec-2024: 3.00%. Damodaran implied ERP Jan-2025: 4.00%. Levered beta (2Y weekly vs SPX): 0.90.

WACC-upper.quote: Risk-free rate (UST10Y) 31-Dec-2024: 3.00%. Damodaran implied ERP Jan-2025: 4.00%. Levered beta (2Y weekly vs SPX): 0.90.

Cost of Equity.quote: Risk-free rate (UST10Y) 31-Dec-2024: 3.00%. Damodaran implied ERP Jan-2025: 4.00%. Levered beta (2Y weekly vs SPX): 0.90.

Cost of Debt (after tax).quote: Pretax cost of debt (interest / avg debt): 4.00%. Cash tax rate assumption: 21%.

Hurdle IRR.quote: Base hurdle: 15%. Hurdle policy adjustment: -150 bps for mature marketplace.

documents.title: Uber Valuation Inputs 2024-12-31
documents.content: Risk-free rate (UST10Y) 31-Dec-2024: 3.00%. Damodaran implied ERP Jan-2025: 4.00%. Levered beta (2Y weekly vs SPX): 0.90. Pretax cost of debt (interest / avg debt): 4.00%. Cash tax rate assumption: 21%. Base hurdle: 15%. Hurdle policy adjustment: -150 bps for mature marketplace. Equity adjustment applied: -25 bps for scale network. Diluted shares: 2.10 billion. Share price (close 31-Dec-2024): $69.00. Market cap: 144,900,000,000 USD. Market value of interest-bearing debt: 6,000,000,000 USD. Inflation anchor: 2.2%. Real GDP anchor: 1.5%. Base FCF (USD millions): 5,051; 5,556; 6,112; 6,723; 7,395. Bull FCF (USD millions): 5,051; 5,809; 6,680; 7,682; 8,834. Bear FCF (USD millions): 5,051; 5,303; 5,568; 5,846; 6,138.
